subtasks: Untangle the hose
Turn off water supply

Remove old nozzle from the hose
Check for leaks in the hose

Attach new nozzle to the end of the hose
Tighten the nozzle onto the hose securely
Confirm the new nozzle is securely attached
Test the spray pattern of the new nozzle

tasks.task: Inspect and maintain garden irrigation system

Identify sections of the garden lacking water
Check sprinkler heads for clogs or debris

Adjust sprinkler heads to ensure even coverage
Set sprinkler timers to appropriate schedule
Check for any broken or missing sprinkler heads
Replace missing or broken sprinkler heads
Test the irrigation system's water pressure
Check for any leaks in the irrigation pipes
Sort tools into the appropriate storage areas
Wipe down tools and equipment

Sweep and clean the floor of the shed
Check for any leaks or water damage in the shed
Apply any necessary repairs to the shed structure
Ensure that all tools are properly labeled
Replenish any missing supplies like oil, grease, etc.
Turn on the main water supply
Check for any warnings or error messages
Verify the system's operation
Monitor the system for any malfunctions
Adjust the system as needed for effective watering
Check for signs of pests or diseases in plants
Prune dead or diseased branches
Remove weeds from the garden beds
Check soil moisture levels
Evaluate plant growth and health
Adjust watering schedules based on conditions
Apply any necessary fertilizers or soil amendments
Plan for future planting or seed saving

Store equipment in protective covers or sheds
